abilities.name: Reactive Protection
abilities.effect: Any damage done to Aerodactyl by attacks from your opponent's Pokémon is reduced by 10 for each React Energy card attached to Aerodactyl (after applying Weakness and Resistance).

attacks.name: Power Blow
attacks.effect: Does 10 damage plus 10 more damage for each Energy attached to Aerodactyl.

attacks.name: Speed Stroke
attacks.effect: During your opponent's next turn, prevent all effects, including damage, done to Aerodactyl by attacks from your opponent's Pokémon-ex.
